title: Loot Crate's Davis on New Partnership With Harry Potter (Audio)
itunes:title: Loot Crate's Davis on New Partnership With Harry Potter (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Chris Davis, CEO and co-Founder of Loot Crate, a subscription box service for gamers, on announcing a new partnership with Harry Potter at this year’s New York Comic Con.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
